de.eckhartarnold.client

Interface AttachmentListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CaptionOverlay, ControlPanel, ControlPanelOverlay, FilmstripOverlay, PanelOverlayBase, Slideshow

    public interface AttachmentListener
    Listener for the "attachment" events onLoad, onUnload.

    Classes implementing the AttachmentListener interface can take notice when another widget becomes "loaded" or "unload", i.e. after the widget is attached to or detached from the document displayed in the browser window.

    Author:
    ecki

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLoad(Widget sender)
      Takes notice that the widget sender has been attached to the browser window.
      void onUnload(Widget sender)
      Takes notice that the widget sender has been removed from the browser window.

    • Method Detail

      • onLoad

        void onLoad(Widget sender)
        Takes notice that the widget sender has been attached to the browser window.
        Parameters:
        sender - the widget which has been attached to the browser window

      • onUnload

        void onUnload(Widget sender)
        Takes notice that the widget sender has been removed from the browser window.
        Parameters:
        sender - the widget which has been removed from the browser window
